# Set Up

Load functions.

```{r load, include = FALSE}
library(CRDSutils)
```

# Check Files

```{r check}
files = file_lookup(params$instrument, params$runDate)
files = check_files(files)
```

# Calibrate Data

```{r calibrate}
corrected = process_data(files)
```

# Review Data

```{r review}
review_data(corrected)
```

# Write Output

```{r write}
#db(corrected, analyst)
excel(files, corrected)
```
